name: Guillotine
effect: Deals 1 Additional Damage for each 20% of the Foe's HP they are missing. Ignore Defenses. Applies all Damage as Wounds. Can only be used Once per Battle. -5 Accuracy.
description: The Pokemon uses the sharpest part of its body to almost snap the neck of its foe. It is a devastating attack. The foe must be lucky to get out of it alive.
